text.title: Impress Family Members
text.head: Impress Family Members
text.p: Have you ever wanted to impress your family members? Have you ever wanted to show them that you are good enough? Read on to know more!
text.head: Steps
Intelligence

list.item: The first and most important way to impress your family members is intelligence. Your parents always have impressions on what you will be in future; a famous businessman, an intelligent scientist or a powerful police officer. So its in your hands to show them that you can fulfill their wishes.

Study. Make yourself busy during free time with your studies. Read and understand everything so that it will be easy for you when a pop-up quiz is there. Science, Mathematics and English are the most important subjects in the whole world as general so concentrate more on these subjects.

Participate. Get bold and ready to face some challenges. Participate in quiz, debates, spelling-B and other educational sports. Try all your best in them, prepare for it and win! Winning is what your parents and other family members want. This will help to boost your family reputation which you are indirectly impressing them.
Get good grades. Getting good grades also help to impress them as now they will have the impression that you are intelligent and clever. Through this, you can easily impress them.

text.head: Behavior

list.item: Behave properly. Do not be rude to your elders and young ones. Always be polite and helping. Make an impression that you are kind not harsh or rude.

Listen to your parents. Listening to your parents helps to make them proud and impressed. Do not object what they are doing or reject their views and ideas. Be happy to whatever they give you and have for you in mind because your parents will always wish for the best for you wherever you are.

Deny wrong. Always be right and justice in your actions. Support the right and advise the wrong. Don't support wrong just because they are your friend or family member or your dear ones. If they need to rectify for their mistakes, tell them to do so.

text.head: Sports

list.item: Play. Develop your body. Participate in sports and other games to show that you can do great in any thing.
Win. Try to win in whatever you do. If its teamwork, then make sure that you are the leading role.

text.head: Tips

list.item: You could crack some good jokes to lighten up the mood.
Enter in to music class, art class and other classes to increase your ability
Don't be too kind or your own family will think you're a creep

text.head: Warnings

list.item: Don't make jokes which just leave an strange silence
Don't be forced into anything you don't want to do
